content: simple classic scarf o it is a simple 1×1 rib-stitch scarf made with lace-weight cashmere yarn though it also works well with other yarn weights o it creates a neat edge by adding two selvedge stitches at the beginning and end of each row along with two slip-stitch rib row at the start and end of the scarf o to prevent the ends from curling you may knit a bit tighter or use a smaller needle size for the first and last two row cast on cast on an even number of stitches to the width you want row 1 2 slip 1 purlwise with yarn in front knit 1 repeat across row 3 desired length  slip the first stitch purlwise with yarn in front  knit the second stitch  continue to purl 1 knit 1 across until 2 stitches remain  slip the second-to-last stitch purlwise with yarn in front  knit the last stitch last 2 row before binding off slip 1 purlwise with yarn in front knit 1 repeat across bind off bind off all stitches
